nodes.text: The Jengardin Millennial Warriors were a military order that operated during the time of the Galactic Republic. They were the developers of the Jengardin double-bladed vibroblade, and never waged war on their homeworld. In about 700 BBY, it merged with a number of other military orders, to form the Iotran Police Force, a military force that was based on Iotra. Following the merger, the Warriors continued to exist within the Police Force, as an organizational unit.
Pirates & Privateers spells the group's name as the Jengardin Millenial Warriors.
